Title: Enacts the digital fair repair act
Summary: Relates to the sale of digital electronic equipment manufactured and first sold or used in New York on or after July 1, 2023; requires original equipment manufacturers to provide diagnostic and repair information; authorizes original equipment manufacturers to establish reasonable training and certification programs for independent repair providers and to offer parts to independent repair providers or owners with other parts where the individual components may pose a heightened safety risk; relates to the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Amd §399-nn, Gen Bus L; amd §3, Chap of 2022 (as proposed on S.4104-A & A.7006-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale of digital electronic equipment and providing diagnostic and repair information; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2022 amending the general business law relating to the sale of digital electronic equipment and providing diagnostic and repair information, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 4104-A and A. 7006-B, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
